question: You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.Write a letter to your manager. In your letter•  explain why you want to work in the company's head office for six months•  say how your work could be done while you are away•  ask for his/her help in arranging it
text: I am writing this letter regarding apply the technician occupy at the head office in India. As a new clerk in our company, I still learn more skills from my supervisor, and I know we have more professional experts in the head office, from whom I can learn excellent knowledge.

I know you are always busy in our company, that is why I have handed over my job to my tutor Daniel, who is a loyal and diligent worker you can trust. That job includes a program of wifi net building up on the third floor and an internet bridge between room2, room4, and room 6. I think it is easy to Daniel to work out.

As a new man in our company, and I never went to the head office before, so could you give me much advice that I can follow up, such as what need I bring with me, or which internet sector I need to review more before I go, etc.
